channel.title: TwistedRealm, Power to the Players!
channel.description:
[url=http://twistedrealm.net][img]http://puu.sh/62eNA.png[/img][/url]
[font=courier new,courier,monospace][size=5][b][u]Join us[/u][/b][/size][/font] [url=http://"http://twistedrealm.net/forums/"]Forums[/url] [url=http://"http://twistedrealm.net/webclient/"]Webclient[/url]
[font=courier new,courier,monospace][u][size=5][b]Community[/b][/size][/u][/font]
[font=georgia, serif]We know that our server is nothing without the players, [/font][font=georgia, serif]which is why [/font]we have staff dedicated to the happiness of the player. [font=georgia, serif]Your input is what we base our server output on. Without players we have nothing, and there is no point of there being a server.[/font] [u][size=4][font=arial,helvetica,sans-serif][b]Your thoughts and suggestions will be acknowledged by our staff. [/b][b]Our updates will be based on your input.[/b][/font][/size][/u]
[u][font=courier new,courier,monospace][b][size=5]Information[/size][/b][/font][/u]
[font=georgia,serif]Welcome to TwistedRealm.[/font]
[font=georgia, serif]TwistedRealm is a PK/Economic based RSPS that is still being improved as we progress into the [/font][font=georgia, serif]endeavor of running it.[/font] [font=georgia,serif]Our staff knows what it is like to be the player that isn't involved in a staff position.[/font][font=georgia, serif]To not have a say in what types of updates occur.[/font] [font=georgia, serif]We aim to keep you, the player, satisfied.[/font]
[u][b][size=5]TwistedRealm Forums[/size][/b][/u]
[font=georgia, serif]The TwistedRealm forums are made for the community, with our professional design it is very easy to navigate throughout our forums and find the perfect section for your post. With such a set-up players don't have the hassle of trying to communicate with a sloppy, unpleasant look. Which leads to both an active community in-game, and out.[/font]
[font=courier new,courier,monospace][u][b][size=5]Staff[/size][/b][/u][/font]
[font=georgia, serif]The staff here at TwistedRealm are finely tuned to help the community.[/font] [font=georgia, serif]As of now the all of the staff has been working together for year [/font][font=georgia, serif]and taking in information that is required to successfully meet the needs of the player[/font]
[u][b][size=5][font=courier new,courier,monospace]Community[/font][/size][/b][/u] [font=georgia,serif][size=4]We listen to our community and we create the content that they enjoy and want to see in the game. The economy is based on players interacting with one another. We hope to see a mature community that can interact with each other [/size][/font][font=georgia, serif]enough to be able to build an economy, and to make an interesting Pk'ing zone.[/font]
[u][size=5][font=courier new,courier,monospace][b]Features[/b][/font][/size][/u]
- Flawless pking allowing for perfect switches and hybriding - No down time - No lag - Perfected Duel arena - Active, friendly staff team - Development team that listens to its community - Frequent updates - Donator Zone - Working spirit shields - Working special attacks - Fight caves - God Wars - Strong and stable economy - Perfect skilling - Dagganoth Kings - Chaotic Weapons - Perfect Bossing/PvM
[center][img]http://puu.sh/62cpW.gif[/img][/center] [center][img]http://puu.sh/62cv8.gif[/img][/center] [center][img]http://puu.sh/6gle9.png[/img][/center] [center][img]http://puu.sh/62HdY.gif[/img][/center] [center][img]http://puu.sh/62GKo.gif[/img] [u][b](Turmoil)[/b][/u][/center] [center][img]http://puu.sh/62d6U.jpg[/img][/center] [center][img]http://puu.sh/62dcP.jpg[/img][/center] [center][img]http://puu.sh/62diu.jpg[/img][/center]

item.title: TwistedRealm, Power to the Players!
item.dc:creator: @darthpepper darthpepper
item.description:
@darthpepper wrote:

[quote=“Flame_, post:7, topic:537797”]Let’s not post information we’re not able to prove, especially when we’re incorrect (namely Togasa).

Good luck with your server darthpepper. :-)[/quote]

Thank you, and thank you for clearing up the issue above

Read full topic

item.title: TwistedRealm, Power to the Players!
item.dc:creator: @darthpepper darthpepper
item.description:
@darthpepper wrote:

Strucker:

wats the gameframe

317, and theres skilling. I’ve reworked a couple of the skills already, and we’re working on fixing any flaws on any remaining skills.

Read full topic

item.title: TwistedRealm, Power to the Players!
item.dc:creator: @darthpepper darthpepper
item.description:
@darthpepper wrote:

[font=courier new,courier,monospace][size=5]Join us[/size][/font]
Forums
Webclient

[font=courier new,courier,monospace][size=5]Community[/size][/font]

[font=georgia, serif]We know that our server is nothing without the players, [/font][font=georgia, serif]which is why [/font]we have staff dedicated to the happiness of the player.
[font=georgia, serif]Your input is what we base our server output on. Without players we have nothing, and there is no point of there being a server.[/font]
[size=4][font=arial,helvetica,sans-serif]Your thoughts and suggestions will be acknowledged by our staff. Our updates will be based on your input.[/font][/size]

[font=courier new,courier,monospace][size=5]Information[/size][/font]

[font=georgia,serif]Welcome to TwistedRealm.[/font]

[font=georgia, serif]TwistedRealm is a PK/Economic based RSPS that is still being improved as we progress into the [/font][font=georgia, serif]endeavor of running it.[/font]
[font=georgia,serif]Our staff knows what it is like to be the player that isn’t involved in a staff position.[/font][font=georgia, serif]To not have a say in what types of updates occur.[/font]
[font=georgia, serif]We aim to keep you, the player, satisfied.[/font]

[size=5]TwistedRealm Forums[/size]

[font=georgia, serif]The TwistedRealm forums are made for the community, with our professional design it is very easy to navigate throughout our forums and find the perfect section for your post. With such a set-up players don’t have the hassle of trying to communicate with a sloppy, unpleasant look. Which leads to both an active community in-game, and out.[/font]

[font=courier new,courier,monospace][size=5]Staff[/size][/font]

[font=georgia, serif]The staff here at TwistedRealm are finely tuned to help the community.[/font]
[font=georgia, serif]As of now the all of the staff has been working together for year [/font][font=georgia, serif]and taking in information that is required to successfully meet the needs of the player[/font]

[size=5][font=courier new,courier,monospace]Community[/font][/size]
[font=georgia,serif][size=4]We listen to our community and we create the content that they enjoy and want to see in the game. The economy is based on players interacting with one another. We hope to see a mature community that can interact with each other [/size][/font][font=georgia, serif]enough to be able to build an economy, and to make an interesting Pk’ing zone.[/font]

[size=5][font=courier new,courier,monospace]Features[/font][/size]

  • Flawless pking allowing for perfect switches and hybriding
  • No down time
  • No lag
  • Perfected Duel arena
  • Active, friendly staff team
  • Development team that listens to its community
  • Frequent updates
  • Donator Zone
  • Working spirit shields
  • Working special attacks
  • Fight caves
  • God Wars
  • Strong and stable economy
  • Perfect skilling
  • Dagganoth Kings
  • Chaotic Weapons
  • Perfect Bossing/PvM
